subject: Re: learning
msgSnippet: Hi Chuck, Thanks. At least now I know I ll be able to use QS via e-mail when I finally get it down. I hope there will be someone will to correspond with me!
messageBody:
Hi Chuck,

Thanks. At least now I know I'll be able to use QS via e-mail when I
finally get it down. I hope there will be someone will to correspond
with me!

Chris

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Chuck Peck <chuck091956@y...>
wrote:
> Hello Chris,
>
> You can use those fonts in emails but only if the
> person you're sending them to also has the same font.
>
> Another way is to create what you want to send and
> then convert it to a PDF format. Their may be other
> ways but these are all I can think about.
>
> Chuck
>

Hi Chuck,

Thanks. At least now I know I'll be able to use QS via e-mail when I 
finally get it down. I hope there will be someone will to correspond 
with me!

Chris

> You can use those fonts in emails but only if the
